xwikidoc.name: XCarouselTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
# Class fields XCarouselCode.XCarouselClass_autoSliding=Auto-defilement XCarouselCode.XCarouselClass_interval=Interval XCarouselCode.XCarouselClass_carouselWidth=Largeur de la carousel XCarouselCode.XCarouselClass_carouselHeight=Hauteur de la carousel XCarouselCode.XCarouselClass_backgroundColor=Couleur de fond xcarousel.slide_title=Caption title xcarousel.slide_titleSize=Title size xcarousel.slide_titleColor=Title color xcarousel.slide_text=Caption text xcarousel.slide_textSize=Text size xcarousel.slide_textColor=Text Color xcarousel.slide_link=Caption title link xcarousel.slide_delete=Supprimer xcarousel.slide_addSlide=Add new slide
# Class helper text xcarousel.helper_autoSliding=Will slide automatically at given interval. xcarousel.helper_interval=Time between automatic slides (if AUTO-SLIDING is on), in milliseconds (defaul is 5000). xcarousel.helper_width=Width in pixels (ex: 1000), if left blank it will take the full width of it's container. xcarousel.helper_height=Height in pixels (ex: 200), if left blank it will take the height of the image. xcarousel.helper_bgcolor=Click the input for color-picker. You can also add the color yourself if you know the CSS id for it.
# Live table generic keys xcarousel.livetable.doc.title=Titre de la page xcarousel.livetable.doc.name=Nom de la page xcarousel.livetable.doc.space=Espace xcarousel.livetable.doc.fullname=Page nom complet xcarousel.livetable.doc.author=Dernière auteur xcarousel.livetable.doc.creator=Créateur xcarousel.livetable.doc.date=Date de mise à jour xcarousel.livetable.doc.creationDate=Date de création xcarousel.livetable._avatar=Avatar xcarousel.livetable._images=Images xcarousel.livetable._attachments=Pièces jointes xcarousel.livetable._actions=Actes xcarousel.livetable._actions.edit=Modifier xcarousel.livetable._actions.delete=Effacer xcarousel.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys xcarousel.livetable.autoSliding=Auto-defilement xcarousel.livetable.interval=Interval xcarousel.livetable.carouselWidth=Largeur xcarousel.livetable.carouselHeight=La taille
